name: GOTO Bridge 18
description:
GOTO Bridge, the must-have bridge software for over 20 years, is coming to iPad for its 18th version!

UNLIMITED DEALS – PRACTICE – PLAY OFFLINE

It includes: bridge lessons, bidding and card play exercises, tournaments and bridge events directly at home. And no Internet connection is required!

PRACTICE

GOTO Bridge 18 is aimed at both beginners and advanced players, and offers multiple practice game modes and unlimited deals: lessons and exercises, easy deals to get started or just have fun playing, card play and bidding practice, practice deals, etc. All these game modes allow you to get familiar with or take up bridge and test your knowledge before pitting your skills against hundreds of virtual players in “Tournaments” game modes.

IDEAL FEATURES TO PROGRESS

Corrections to your bidding: explains your mistakes
Corrections to your card play: shows the best card to play to take as many tricks as possible on the deal
Tips given by the computer: tells you what it would play if it were in your position
Play all players' hands at the table
See other players' cards
Reverse, forward and replay: navigate through the deal as you wish and replay the tricks you want

SET YOUR OWN CONVENTIONS

GOTO Bridge allows you to choose between the following bidding systems: SAYC (Standard American Yellow Card), English ACOL system, French 5-card major system, Polish system, Nordic system, NBB Standard system, Forum D and 2/1 system. A free profile also allows you to set your own conventions.

PLAY OFFLINE

Play bridge wherever and whenever you like! While travelling abroad, on the plane, the train, the underground… In any place without Internet access.

FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY

GOTO Bridge allows you to add, edit and delete user profiles so that each family member can play bridge and get his own rankings and results.

DEVELOPED BY BRIDGE EXPERTS

The team in charge of designing GOTO Bridge is not new to this game. Indeed, it is the same bridge addicts who are behind the world-famous Funbridge app. Among them is Jérôme Rombaut, 2017 Vice World Bridge Champion.

GOTO BRIDGE 18 NEW FEATURES

New bidding and card play lessons with exercises
Play the best deals from 2017 Lyon World Bridge Championships
6,000 new deals
Challenge the game engine Argine and try to win a 1-year subscription to the Funbridge app
New graphic interface

MAIN FEATURES

Immediate comparison on all deals played
Analysis of your bidding and card play at the end of each deal
Set your bidding conventions
Bidding and card play practice
Corrections to your bidding and card play
Tips and help given by the computer
Tournaments and bridge events
Lessons with exercises
Play offline

AND STILL AVAILABLE

Unlimited deals
Play deals from any hand
Manage user profiles for the whole family
Par score and contracts most often played on the deal
Claim remaining tricks
Challenge the best world players
